item.title: Visualized Approximate Eigen Vector by Power Iteration on 3 dimensions.
item.description: You can intuitively lean Power Iteration by Visualization Power. Animation of Power Iteration by MATLAB Power iteration - Wikipedia Finally you put a command line $ convert -layers optimize -loop 0 -delay 40 eigenvector*.png anim.gif
